name: No Thing Is Broken
description:
You are a cube owl in a long orange brick road.

Made for the Coding Blocks Game Jam 2021 (#cbjam) under the theme "Everything is Broken".

Fair warning: Ends in a cliff hanger, sorry. No time to finish  D:

Owl made by me long ago.
Audio: kenney.nl, bensound.com and freesound.org
Everything else created during/for the Jam

Better played in 16:9
